title: Everything is going to be okay.
fields: Feel free to ping the HRA team or a member of the community - many are happy to offer assistance over voice or text chat. Alternatively, [TripSit.me](https://chat.tripsit.me/) has an online support room - look for the green button that says "Sanctuary"

Check out [this Youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/user/TheMeditativeMind) dedicated to good vibes. [This video](https://youtu.be/yl74sWWtHTg) is a three hour meditative loop of relaxing, meditative bamboo flute.

**You are going to be okay.** Take long, deep breaths - focus on the motion of breathing.
**You are loved.** You are supported.
